event.title: 1852 the city of Tabor was founded

data.event: In 1852 the city of Tabor was founded by several Christian clergymen, who were also active abolitionists, (George Gaston, Samuel A. Adams, and Rev. John Todd) and their families.

event.title: now Tabor in order to found

data.event: They chose to settle in what is now Tabor in order to found a Christian college, which eventually became Tabor College.
The only building remaining from the college has now been subdivided into apartments.
